mapper.select: /* base_info */ SELECT TVM.VDR_NM , TMOM.MTL_ORD_REG_ID , TVM.VDR_TEL , TVM.VDR_FAX , TVM.VDR_ML1 , TVM.VDR_ML2 , TVM.VDR_ML3 , TCM.CST_NM , TCM.CST_NO , TCM.CST_CEO_NM , TCM.CST_ADD , TCM.CST_TEL , TCM.CST_FAX , TPM.PJT_NM , TMOM.ORD_IDX , TMOM.MTL_ORD_PLC , SYSDATE() AS DATE FROM T_MTL_ORD_MST TMOM LEFT JOIN T_MTL_ORD_DTL TMOD ON TMOD.ORD_IDX = TMOM.ORD_IDX LEFT JOIN T_WHS_HIS TWH ON TWH.MTL_ORD_DTL_IDX = TMOD.MTL_ORD_DTL_IDX LEFT JOIN T_MTL_MST TMM ON TMM.MTL_IDX = TMOD.MTL_IDX LEFT JOIN T_VDR_MST TVM ON TVM.VDR_IDX = TMOM.VDR_IDX LEFT JOIN T_PJT_MST TPM ON TPM.PJT_IDX = TMOM.PJT_IDX LEFT JOIN T_CST_MST TCM ON TCM.CST_IDX = TPM.CST_IDX WHERE TMOM.ORD_IDX = #{ORD_IDX} ORDER BY TMOM.ORD_IDX LIMIT 1

/* info_List_project */ SELECT TMM.MTL_IDX ,TMM.MTL_NM ,TMM.MTL_STD ,TMOD.ORD_DTL_QTY ,TWH.MTL_ORD_DTL_IDX ,TMM.MTL_UNT ,TMM.MTL_BG ,TMOM.MTL_ORD_DLV_DT ,IF(TMM.MTL_PRICE='' OR TMM.MTL_PRICE=null,0,TMM.MTL_PRICE) AS MTL_PRICE FROM T_MTL_ORD_MST TMOM LEFT JOIN T_MTL_ORD_DTL TMOD ON TMOD.ORD_IDX = TMOM.ORD_IDX LEFT JOIN T_WHS_HIS TWH ON TWH.MTL_ORD_DTL_IDX = TMOD.MTL_ORD_DTL_IDX LEFT JOIN T_MTL_MST TMM ON TMM.MTL_IDX = TMOD.MTL_IDX WHERE TMOM.ORD_IDX = #{ORD_IDX}
mapper.insert: /* insertBOM2 */ INSERT INTO T_BOM_MST ( MTL_IDX, PJT_IDX, BOM_MTL_QTY, BOM_DEL_YN, BOM_REG_DT, BOM_REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{MTL_IDX}, #{PJT_IDX}, '0', 'Y', SYSDATE(), #{REG_ID} )

update.foreach: UPDATE T_EST_MST SET MTL_REQ_QTY = IFNULL(#{item.MTL_REQ_QTY}, 0), MTL_EST_REG_DT = IFNULL(#{item.MTL_EST_REG_DT}, SYSDATE()) WHERE EST_IDX = #{item.EST_IDX}

mapper.select:
/* selectMaterialIO */ SELECT WHS_HIS_IDX, TMM.MTL_IDX, CMM_FLE_IDX, MTL_CATE, MTL_NM, MTL_MKR_CD, MTL_MKR_NO, MTL_STD, MTL_PRICE, MTL_UNT, MTL_QTY, MTL_DS_URL, MTL_BG, MTL_REG_DT, MTL_REG_ID, TWH.WHS_HIS_GB, TWH.ORD_IDX, WHS_HIS_QTY FROM T_WHS_HIS TWH LEFT JOIN T_MTL_MST TMM ON TWH.MTL_IDX = TMM.MTL_IDX LEFT JOIN T_MTL_ORD_DTL TMOD ON TWH.MTL_ORD_DTL_IDX =TMOD.MTL_ORD_DTL_IDX WHERE MTL_DEL_YN = 'N'
AND WHS_HIS_GB=#{WHS_HIS_GB};

/* selectMaterialNotIO */ SELECT WHS_HIS_IDX, TMM.MTL_IDX, CMM_FLE_IDX, MTL_CATE, MTL_NM, MTL_MKR_CD, MTL_MKR_NO, MTL_STD, MTL_PRICE, MTL_UNT, MTL_QTY, MTL_DS_URL, MTL_BG, MTL_REG_DT, MTL_REG_ID, TWH.WHS_HIS_GB, ORD_IDX, WHS_HIS_QTY FROM T_MTL_MST TMM LEFT JOIN T_WHS_HIS TWH ON TMM.MTL_IDX = TWH.MTL_IDX WHERE MTL_DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: /* insertEstimateOs1 */ INSERT INTO T_WHS_HIS ( MTL_IDX, WHS_HIS_GB, WHS_HIS_REG_DT, WHS_HIS_REG_ID, WHS_DEL_YN, WHS_HIS_QTY ) VALUES( #{MTL_IDX}, IF(#{WHS_HIS_GB}='null','IN',#{WHS_HIS_GB}), SYSDATE(), #{REG_ID}, 'N', #{WHS_HIS_QTY} )
